movie.title: Estamos Juntos
movie.description_intro: The plot centers on a young female doctor Carmen with a terminal disease. A feeling of urgency unconsciously leads her to live each moment of her life as it were the last. During this journey into the unknown, she gets involved with two men and a homeless community.
movie.description_full: The plot centers on a young female doctor Carmen with a terminal disease. A feeling of urgency unconsciously leads her to live each moment of her life as it were the last. During this journey into the unknown, she gets involved with two men and a homeless community.

movies.title: Loco
movies.summary: In "Loco," Alex (Tim Torre), a brilliant but troubled young man is thrust into a dark underworld when he becomes a pawn in a brutal struggle between two drug lords for a new street drug called LOCO. Alex's only hope comes from a beautiful girl, Lydia (Geffri Maya), who is also caught up in the scheme, and together they try to escape their dangerous world. A shocking surprise awaits them...because nothing is what it seems to be in the world of LOCO.
movies.description_full: In "Loco," Alex (Tim Torre), a brilliant but troubled young man is thrust into a dark underworld when he becomes a pawn in a brutal struggle between two drug lords for a new street drug called LOCO. A shocking surprise awaits them...because nothing is what it seems to be in the world of LOCO.

movies.title: My Son! My Son!
movies.summary: Parents campaign to change the law for families who have suffered from violent crime, after their son is murdered.
movies.description_full: Parents campaign to change the law for families who have suffered from violent crime, after their son is murdered.
movies.synopsis: Parents campaign to change the law for families who have suffered from violent crime, after their son is murdered.

movies.title: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion
movies.title_english: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion
movies.title_long: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion (1970)
movies.summary: A chief of detectives, homicide section, kills his mistress and deliberately leaves clues to prove his own responsibility for the crime.
movies.description_full: A chief of detectives, homicide section, kills his mistress and deliberately leaves clues to prove his own responsibility for the crime.
movies.synopsis: A chief of detectives, homicide section, kills his mistress and deliberately leaves clues to prove his own responsibility for the crime.

movies.title: Starbuck
movies.summary: At 42, David lives the life of an irresponsible adolescent. He coasts through life with minimal effort and maintains a complicated relationship with Valerie, a young policewoman. Just as she tells him she's pregnant, David's past resurfaces. Twenty years earlier, he began providing sperm to a fertility clinic in exchange for money. He discovers he's the father of 533 children, 142 of whom have filed a class action lawsuit to determine the identity of their biological father, known only by the pseudonym Starbuck.
